name: BSP_APSP
tagline: Parallel All Pair Shortest Path Problem (APSP)  in BSP style
body:
### Parallel All Shortest Path Problem (APSP) in BSP style.
Parallel APSP design using Bulk Syncronous Parallel modelling. The code is written in C and the scripts are used to run the program on Huygens SuperComputer.


### Authors and Contributors
Stathis Grigoropoulos (@touristroni).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
